bibl.title: The constitutio Antoniniana (AD 212): Taxes or Religion?
bibl.note: A short version of this paper was read at a Round Table about the constitutio Antoniniana in All Souls College, Oxford, June 15, 2012. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Taxes or Religion. - 3. Imperial Representation under Caracalla. - 4. Caracalla versus Geta. - 5. Decius. - 6. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Lukas de Blois, The constitutio Antoniniana (AD 212): Taxes or Religion?

A short version of this paper was read at a Round Table about the constitutio Antoniniana in All Souls College, Oxford, June 15, 2012. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Taxes or Religion. - 3. Imperial Representation under Caracalla. - 4. Caracalla versus Geta. - 5. Decius. - 6. Conclusion.
